Video Player with Folders Project

My Favorite Video Player Code Features

  • Auto-Play Splash Screen On boot, the player automatically loops a video—ideal for a splash screen or instructional clip.

  • Folder Previews When you tap the screen, you’ll see a snapshot of each folder’s videos. Swipe left/right or use the arrow buttons to browse.

  • Playback Modes Choose to play the videos in each folder sequentially or in shuffle mode.

  • Easy Exit To exit during video playback, just touch and hold.

  • Fast-Forward & Skip Swipe to fast-forward within a video, or tap to jump ahead.
